scripts.install:sync: echo '---- BACKEND' && cd ./backend && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- CREATE-TASK' && cd ./create-task && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- NAVBAR' && cd ./navbar && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- ONE-TASK' && cd ./one-task && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- ROOT' && cd ./root && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- TASKS-LIST' && cd ./tasks-list && pnpm i && cd ../ && echo '---- UTILS' && cd ./utils && pnpm i && cd ../
scripts.install:async: pnpm concurrently "cd ./backend && pnpm i" "cd ./create-task && pnpm i" "cd ./navbar && pnpm i" "cd ./one-task && pnpm i" "cd ./root && pnpm i" "cd ./tasks-list && pnpm i" "cd ./utils && pnpm i"
scripts.dev: pnpm concurrently "cd ./backend && pnpm dev" "cd ./create-task && pnpm start:standalone" "cd ./navbar && pnpm start:standalone" "cd ./one-task && pnpm start:standalone" "cd ./root && pnpm start" "cd ./tasks-list && pnpm start:standalone" "cd ./utils && pnpm start:standalone"
